scripts.script:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'Upgrader') BEGIN EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA Upgrader'); END
IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'Upgrader' AND TABLE_NAME = 'ExecutedScripts' ) BEGIN CREATE TABLE Upgrader.ExecutedScripts ( SysId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL , ScriptId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL , DateExecuted DATETIME NOT NULL , AssemblyName NVARCHAR(100) NOT NULL , CONSTRAINT PK_SysId PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (SysId) ) END
